languages.text: Механизм собирал безумец — компоненты друг другу не подходят и лишь смущают разум, однако вы вовремя замечаете скрытый триггер. Ловушка!

traits.locale_text: Механизм собирал безумец — компоненты друг другу не подходят и лишь смущают разум, однако вы вовремя замечаете скрытый триггер. Ловушка!

languages.text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!
languages.original_text: Механизм собирал безумец — компоненты друг другу не подходят и лишь смущают разум, однако вы вовремя замечаете скрытый триггер. Ловушка!

traits.locale_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!
The contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse the observer, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It is a trap!
This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!
This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!
This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!

languages.text: この仕掛けは狂人が組み立てたものだろう。部品は互いに合致することはなく、ただ混乱させるためにあるが、あなたは作動する前になんとか隠された仕組みを発見した。これは罠だ！
languages.original_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!

traits.locale_text: この仕掛けは狂人が組み立てたものだろう。部品は互いに合致することはなく、ただ混乱させるためにあるが、あなたは作動する前になんとか隠された仕組みを発見した。これは罠だ！

languages.text: Algún lunático ha preparado este armatoste. Los componentes no encajan entre sí y solo sirven para despistar, pero logras ver el disparador oculto a tiempo. ¡Es una trampa!
languages.original_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!

traits.locale_text: Algún lunático ha preparado este armatoste. Los componentes no encajan entre sí y solo sirven para despistar, pero logras ver el disparador oculto a tiempo. ¡Es una trampa!

languages.text: 这件奇妙的装置绝对是某个疯子拼起来的，装置里面的几种部件完全无法兼容，只会引起混乱和故障。幸亏你及时找到了隐藏机关。这是个陷阱！
languages.original_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!

traits.locale_text: 这件奇妙的装置绝对是某个疯子拼起来的，装置里面的几种部件完全无法兼容，只会引起混乱和故障。幸亏你及时找到了隐藏机关。这是个陷阱！

languages.text: Cet appareil a été conçu par une personne folle à lier. Ses composants hétéroclites ont été assemblés de manière à embrouiller la personne souhaitant l'utiliser. Cependant, vous parvenez à repérer le déclencheur juste à temps. C'est un piège !
languages.original_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!

traits.locale_text: Cet appareil a été conçu par une personne folle à lier. Ses composants hétéroclites ont été assemblés de manière à embrouiller la personne souhaitant l'utiliser. Cependant, vous parvenez à repérer le déclencheur juste à temps. C'est un piège !

languages.text: Diese Apparatur wurde von einem Wahnsinnigen gebaut. Die Teile passen nicht zueinander und verschleiern und verwirren nur, doch es gelingt dir noch rechtzeitig, den verborgenen Auslöser zu entdecken. Das ist eine Falle!
languages.original_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!

traits.locale_text: Diese Apparatur wurde von einem Wahnsinnigen gebaut. Die Teile passen nicht zueinander und verschleiern und verwirren nur, doch es gelingt dir noch rechtzeitig, den verborgenen Auslöser zu entdecken. Das ist eine Falle!

languages.text: Bu zımbırtıyı delinin teki hazırlamış. Parçalar birbirini tutmuyor. İnsanın kafasını karıştırıp dursa da gizli saklı tetiği tam zamanında görmeyi başarıyorsun. Bu bir tuzak!
languages.original_text: This contraption was assembled by a madman. The components do not match one another and only serve to confuse and confound, but you manage to spot the hidden trigger in time. It's a trap!
